title: French-Inspired Lianyungang China City Break in Central Business District
description:
Set high above the city in Lianyungangâ€™s bustling CBD, this sleek, sky-piercing retreat is perfectly placed for both business and discovery. Explore the gateway to the ancient Silk Road, where golden beaches meet sacred mountains, staying in true Sofitel French-inspired style between adventures. 

After visiting Huaguo Mountain, relaxing in a hot spring or strolling the lively harbourfront, return to indulgent comforts - unwind with a swim in the indoor pool, recharge in the fitness centre, enjoy a meal at Kwee-Zeen and the traditional Le Chinois or simply take in sweeping city views from your ultra-modern, spacious room.
offer_address: 7 Hailian Middle Road, Haizhou, Lianyungang, Jiangsu, 222000, China
